description:
Hidden beneath the cloak is Pole Cross Sacred Fist user Liu Fei-He, a woman martial artist who loved Liu Fei-Yan like a brother. When she learned of Fei-Yan`s death, avenging him became her purpose in life.
Meanwhile, as Yasaka and Erika are eating with the orphans, a mysterious group appears. Loud classical music suddenly begins playing. When kenshiro arrives, he takes on the man who materializes out of the darkness: the Dutch army`s Captain Kolk.
"I shall create the ultimate human weapon!"
Enraged by the way Kolk drives men mad, Kenshiro`s fists explode with fury.
Source: crunchyroll
